name: The Last Argonaut
description:
In a matter of seconds, an uneasy peace explodes into full scale war.  Opposing forces have united and former allies have become deadly enemies.  The world is in chaos and it no longer matters which side you are on. It only matters that you survive.

Battle through 16 levels of action packed combat against enemies on land, sea, and in the air.  Use a variety of weapons to destroy the enemy and discover the sinister plot that started the Second Great War. Your squadmates are gone. Your fleet is gone. Your country is gone. There is only you...and them.
